paragraphs.body: The term "Deer dog" has not been confirmed by official sources.
paragraphs.text: The term "Deer dog" has not been confirmed by official sources.

paragraphs.body: A deer dog is a chimerical ${link_0} that is kept as a pet in the ${link_1} climate of the ${link_2}. One of these dogs was leisurely sitting on the porch of a house when ${link_3} and ${link_4} ran past in an attempt to lose ${link_5}.
paragraphs.text: A deer dog is a chimerical mammal that is kept as a pet in the desert climate of the Misty Palms Oasis. One of these dogs was leisurely sitting on the porch of a house when Mako and Bolin ran past in an attempt to lose Macao and Lily.

paragraphs.body: The deer dog is a quadruped animal with brown fur going down its back and sides, cream-white fur covering its underbelly, and a lighter shade of brown coloring its tail and muzzle. It has a set of antlers adorning its head.
paragraphs.text: The deer dog is a quadruped animal with brown fur going down its back and sides, cream-white fur covering its underbelly, and a lighter shade of brown coloring its tail and muzzle. It has a set of antlers adorning its head.

paragraphs.body: The body of the deer dog mostly resembles an Appenzeller Sennenhund or a crossbreed of a Rottweiler and a German shepherd, all of which are breeds of domesticated dog. Its antlers resemble those of a type of deer, most notably the white-tailed deer.
paragraphs.text: The body of the deer dog mostly resembles an Appenzeller Sennenhund or a crossbreed of a Rottweiler and a German shepherd, all of which are breeds of domesticated dog. Its antlers resemble those of a type of deer, most notably the white-tailed deer.
